description:
Attorney Mark F. McKenna founded our Pittsburgh law firm, McKenna & Associates, P.C., with the goal of protecting the rights of injured victims and families living in western Pennsylvania. Today, he and our legal team continue to strive toward his original goal as they represent our clients in cases stemming from the following:

  • Personal injury
  • Product liability
  • Premises liability
  • Medical malpractice
  • Nursing home abuse and neglect

In addition to our primary practice area, we also represent clients in a variety of civil matters, including the following:

  • Construction litigation
  • Contract disputes
  • Bad faith insurance

Our team of attorneys not only represents clients from western Pennsylvania, but clients from northern West Virginia also seek our assistance. We have the ability to practice law in both states' courts, along with the U.S. District Courts for the Middle and Western Districts of Pennsylvania and the Northern and Southern Districts of West Virginia, the U.S. Courts of Appeals for the 3rd and 4th Circuits, and the U.S. Supreme Court.

If you have a legal need, the attorneys at our law firm, McKenna & Associates, P.C., have the ability to assist you. We will work diligently to ensure justice prevails in your case. If you would like to learn more about why so many in the region turn to us, you can schedule a free initial consultation at our Pittsburgh law office.
